texts.es: Este comit se denomina Medalla Milagrosa estn en el Segundo Ciclo con 17 integrantes, es un grupo que se destaca en el barrio por ser muy unidas, solidarias y responsables, ellas tienen actividades diferentes donde cada una trabaja para ayudar a sus familias. Una de las integrantes es la seora Barcilisa quien es ama de casa y se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras desde casa. En la atencin del negocio le ayudan sus hijos y de esa forma ella obtiene ingresos que ayudan con los gastos diarios de la familia. Ella es una seora muy trabajadora con una familia muy humilde pero con muchos deseos de superarse y sacar adelante a su familia de la mejor manera posible. Solicita el prstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
This group called Medalla Milagrosa ("Miraculous Medal") is in its second loan cycle with 17 members. This is a group that stands out in the neighborhood for its solidarity and being very united and responsible. The women make a living in different activities in which each one works to help out her family. One of the members is Barcilisa, who is a housewife and makes a living selling fruits and vegetables from her home. Her children help her tend to the business and in this way she earns an income to help with daily family expenses. She is a very hard-working woman with a very humble family and has a strong desire to move up in life and make headway for her family in the best way possible. She is requesting the loan to purchase fruits and vegetables.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase fruits and vegetables, and other items for the member's respective businesses

loan.name: Amparo Colombia

texts.es:
Amparo de 38 aos, vive en el Fortn de Guayaquil (zona periurbana, sus caminos y calles son de tierra y hay que subir lomas para ir a las casas), ella tiene una tienda de vivieres hace 8 aos atrs.
Desde hace aos ella comenz a trabajar en su propia tienda no solo para ser independiente sino para solventar los gastos de sus dos hijos ya que su esposo se separo de ella, con esfuerzo y dedicacin ella ha surtido su tienda, trabaja desde las 06h00am hasta el anochecer.
Con el prstamo quiere comprar una vitrina, arroz y lcteos para su tienda, en el futuro quiere tener un negocio adicional como un restaurante.
texts.en:
Amparo, 38, lives in Fortn de Guayaquil (on the outskirts of the city where the avenues and streets are unpaved and its necessary to climb hills to get to the houses). She has had a general store for the past 8 years. From some time ago she started to work in her own store not only to be independent, but also to cover the expenses of her two children since her husband separated from her. With efforts and dedication she has supplied her store and she works from 6 am until sunset. With the loan she will buy a display case, rice and dairy products for her store. In the future she would like to have another business like a restaurant.

Translated from Spanish by Miriam Palacio, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: A display case, rice, and dairy products

loan.name: Mireya Gioconda

texts.es:
Mireya Gioconda P. P. tiene 20 aos. Vive en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 2 nios de 2 y 4 aos.
Mireya es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Mireya se dedica a la agricultura y tiene cultivos de maracuy. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Matilde todos los fines de semana.
Solicita el prstamo para invertir para dar compra de semilla de cacao y poder sembrar. El crdito le ayudara para poder tener sus cultivos de cacao propios. Su sueo es poder darle una buena educacin a su hijo.
Le gusta practicar la lectura y ver televisin.
texts.en:
Mireya Gioconda P. P. is 20. She lives in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolivar. She has 2 children ages 2 and 4. Mireya is a member of the rural El Placer solidarity group, which is located three hours from Chillanes. There are 19 members in total, the majority of whom cultivate corn and cocoa. This is their first loan with Cooperativa San Jose. Mireya is a farmer and grows passion fruit. She makes her purchases and sales in Matilde every weekend. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of cocoa seeds to be able to sow them. The loan will help her to have her own cocoa crops. Her dream is to be able to give her child a good education. She likes reading and watching television.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: to have more cocoa crops

loan.name: Elman Santiago

texts.es:
El seor Elman Santiago R. L., tiene 31 aos de edad vive en Lomas de Gavilan es casado y su esposa es ama de casa, pero le apoya en las tareas de la finca, ellos tienen 4 hijos, ellos son agricultores desde hace 5 aos y fue con el apoyo de su papa que comenzaron a trabajar en esta actividad.
La afectacin de plagas le ha dificultado la buena produccin de las cosechas, es por esta razn que solicita un prstamo para la compra de fungicidas, fertilizantes, e insumos vegetativos, esta inversin le garantizara una mejor cosecha y la posibilidad de una ganancia mayor que les permitir mejores condiciones econmicas para todos los miembros de la familia.
texts.en:
Mr Elman Santiago R. L., age 31, lives in Lomas de Gavilan. He is married and his wife is a housewife, but she helps him with the farm chores. They have 4 children. They have been farmers for 5 years; it was with the help of his father that they were able to start this activity. Plagues have made good production difficult. For this reason he is requesting a loan for the purchase of fungicides, fertilizers and vegetable inputs. This investment will guarantee a better harvest and the possibility of better income which will permit them to improve the economic condition of all of the family members.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: the purchase of fungicides, fertilizers and vegetable inputs, which will guarantee a better harvest

loan.name: Olivia Margot

texts.es:
Olivia Margot C. R. tiene 33 aos. Vive en unin libre en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 4 nios de 12, 9, 7, y 6 aos.
Olivia es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Olivia se dedica a la agricultura y a la sembra de maz, arroz, y cacao. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao y en San Jose de Tambo para cacao cada 15 dias y 2 cosechas para maz.
Solicita el prstamo para sembrar maz y tener el agua, semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes. El crdito le permitir comprar todo al mismo tiempo para sembrar el maz. Su sueo es poder estudiar y tener buena profesin. Ha tenido problemas con los animales en el maz, eso presenta un desafo a su negocio.
Le gusta jugar pelota y aprender.
texts.en:
Olivia Margot C. R. is 33. She is in a common law marriage and lives in the canton of Chillanes in the province of Bolivar. She has 4 children ages 12, 9, 7 and 6. Olivia is a member of the rural El Placer solidarity group, which is located three hours from Chillanes. There are 19 members in total, the majority of whom cultivate corn and cocoa. This is their first loan with Cooperativa San Jose. Olivia is a farmer who grows corn, rice and cocoa. She makes her purchases and sales in Mata de Cacao and in San Jose de Tambo, every 15 days for cocoa and every 2 harvests for corn. She is requesting this loan to sow corn and have the water, seeds, manure and fertilizer. The loan will allow her to buy all of this at the same time to sow the corn. Her dream is to be able to study and have a good profession. She has had problems with the animals and the corn which have presented challenges to her business. She enjoys playing ball and learning.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: the purchase of manure to sow corn

loan.name: Maria Ines

texts.es: Maria Ines tiene 37 aos, su actividad es la venta de tortillas junto a su esposa tienen 4 nios menores de edad de los cuales cuidan a diario. Sus inicios se dan por que ninguno de los dos tena experiencia profesional y juntos deciden iniciar este medio de vida para generar ingresos para su hogar, pues siempre estn pensando en sus hijos que necesitan estudios y otras cosas que son muy importantes. El financiamiento que solicitan es para la compra de maz, comal, bolsas, cal entre otras cosas necesarias para la elaboracin de sus tortillas. Suea con agrandar su negocio y poder obtener una pequea pulpera.
texts.en:
Maria Ines is 37 years old. She has a business selling tortillas. She and her husband have 4 dependent children, who they care for daily. Their business came about because neither of them had professional experience. Together they decided to start this way of making a living to generate income for their home, since they are always thinking about their children and their need for schooling and other very important things. The loan they are requesting is for the purchase of corn, a comal (a ceramic dish or metal hotplate used for cooking tortillas), bags, lime and other items they need to make their tortillas. She hopes to expand her business and to be able to open a small grocery store.

Translated from Spanish by Marni Siegal, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: working capital

loan.name: Tembiapor Group

texts.es: Este comite surgue por iniciativas de algunas seoras quienes deseaban aumentar su capital de trabajo y otras emprender actividades productivas, de ah que coordinaron la reunin para confromar el comit y actualmente el comit se encuentra en pleno desarrollo y todas se encuentran satisfechas con sus trabajos. El comit se encuentra en una zona donde la mayoria de la personas se dedica a la agricultura y crias de animales para generar ingresos, ademas es un zana con poco movimieto comercial, por lo que las personas muchas veces viajan hasta otras ciudades para comercializar sus productos. Una de las integrantes del comit es la seora Braudelina quien tiene un negocio para generar sus ingresos. Ella ofrece productos para usos del hogar a precios accesibles y muchas veces le provee de mercaderias a sus socias del comit a cambio de otros productos como quesos o leches. Es una seora muy activa y generosa ayuda a todas sus socias de alguna manera para que salgan adelante. Solicita el prestamo para cargar mercaderias en su negocio como productos enlatados, arroz, verduras, fideos, aceite, azucar y otros.
texts.en:
This group started thanks to the initiatives of a few of the women who wanted to increase their capital for work and other activities. From there, they coordinated a meeting to form the group. Now the group is in full swing and all of the members are satisfied with their work. The group is located in an area where the majority of the people make a living in agriculture and livestock, and there is little commercial movement, which is why the people many times travel to other cities to sell their goods. One of the members is Braudelina, who has a business offering household products at fair prices, and many times she provides supplies to her fellow members in exchange for other products such as cheese or milk. Braudelina is a very active and generous woman who in some way helps all of her fellow members to make headway. She is requesting the loan to bring in merchandise for her business, products like canned goods, rice, vegetables, noodles, oils, sugar and other items.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Acquire canned goods, rice, vegetables, noodles, oils, sugar and other items

loan.name: San Roque Group

texts.es: El comit lleva por nombre C.M.R de SAN ROQUE pues se encuentran en un barrio del mismo nombre , sus objetivos es trabajar en grupo, ir aumentando los monto de los prstamos y por ende la calidad de vida de ellas mismas y de sus familiares. Actualmente se encuentran en el sexto ciclo integrada por 11 sacrificadas mujeres, quienes trabajan a diario para brindarle lo mejor a sus respectivas familias. Todas las integrantes son personas muy activas, y sacan los crditos para invertir en sus respectivas actividades y hasta la actulalidad han cumplido con todos los pagos sin mora. Petrona A. es una de las integrante y se dedica a la confeccion de trajes de noches para damas, sus trabajos son muy delicados y admirados por sus clientes, por los que constantemente tiene trabajo. Ella desde muy joven estudio esta profesion con la ayuda de sus padre, y actualmente el ingreso que obtiene de este trabajo ayuda muchisimo a su familia. Ella comenta que seguira trabajando mucho y que seguir trabajando con sus socias del comite, y en esta ocacin solicita el prestamo para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, y otros accesorios para confeccin.
texts.en:
The San Roque group is named after the neighborhood where the members live. Their objective is to work as a group, to keep increase the amounts of their loan and thus improve the quality of live for themselves and their families. The group is currently in its sixth loan cycle and consists of 11 hard-working women who work every day to provide the best for their respective families. All of the members are very active women who use the loans to invest in their respective activities, and to date they have fulfilled all of their payments without fail. Petrona A. is one of the members, and she makes a living making nightgowns for women. Her items are very delicate and much admired by her customers, so she constantly has work. She has studied this profession since she was a young girl with the help of her father, and now the money she makes from her work really helps her family. She plans to keep working hard and working together with her fellow members. She is requesting the loan to purchase fabric, thread, buttons and other sewing items.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase fabric, thread, buttons and other sewing items.

loan.name: Felix Antonio

texts.es: Flix Alberto tiene la actividad de venta de pescado ya que l es pescador. Hace ms de 20 aos que tiene esta actividad, por lo que desde muy joven ha trabajo debido a la necesidad de su familia, el tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo, por lo que siempre est buscando la forma de generar ingresos para su hogar. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de materia prima necesaria para su negocio y tambin quiere realizarles ciertas reparaciones a su bote. Suea con mejorar con su vivienda, ya que es un hombre muy responsable con su familia y negocio.
texts.en:
Flix Alberto makes a living selling fish since he is a fisherman. He has been doing this activity for more than 20 years and started working at a very young age out of family necessity. He has two young children under his care, so he is always looking for a way to generate income for his family. He is requesting the loan to purchase raw materials necessary for his business, and he also wants to make certain repairs to his boat. He dreams of improving his home since he is very responsible with his family and his business.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase raw materials and make certain repairs to his boat

loan.name: Mirella Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mirella de 43 aos, vive en el Guasmo de Guayaquil(zona urbana, la mayora de habitantes son comerciantes informales), ella tiene una papelera en su casa vende bebidas, papelera, cuadernos .(en Ecuador se los llama bazar).
Desde hace aos ella comenz a trabajar en su propia papelera no solo para ser independiente y por la separacin de su esposo sino para solventar los gastos de sus hijos, con esfuerzo y dedicacin ella ha surtido su papelera, trabaja desde las 08h00am.
Quiere comprar con el prstamo cuadernos, hojas y laminas para surtir mas su negocio, en el futuro quiere tener un almacn en el centro de la ciudad.
texts.en:
Mirella is 43 years old and lives in Guasmo de Guayaquil (an urban zone whose inhabitants mainly work in sales on the informal economy). She has a store in her home, called a "bazar" in Ecuador, in which she sells items such as school supplies, paper goods, and soft drinks. She started her own school supply store years ago, not only for the sake of independence and because of her separation from her husband, but also to cover her children's expenses. With effort and dedication, she has been able to expand her store's inventory. She works starting at 8:00 in the morning. With the loan, she would like to buy notebooks, paper sheets and laminated educational materials to further expand her store's inventory. In the future, she would like to have a store in downtown Guayaquil. .

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Notebooks, paper, learning materials

loan.name: Marta

texts.es: Marta Eugenia L. L. es una seora de 43 aos de edad quien vive con su esposo y sus 5 hijos en una comunidad llamada Canalete localizada en Upala en la provincia de Alajuela, es un lugar semi montaoso y sus actividades econmicas se centran en la agricultura y mayormente en la ganadera. Es una comunidad con una gran oportunidad de desarrollo y establecimiento de microempresas, tanto de agroindustria como comercio. Hace varios aos Doa Marta decidi tener su propio negocio; Por lo que compro una casita cerca de su casa para alquilarla a los estudiantes o turistas de la zona. Esto le ha permitido tener una fuente de ingresos con la cual ha sacado adelante a sus hijos, Sin embargo por la falta de mantenimiento la casita se encuentra en muy mal estado, y necesita repararlo para seguir rentarlo y seguir obteniendo ganancias, es por eso que necesita un prstamo de 617.000 (Seiscientos diecisiete mil colones ) para comprar vidrios, portones y madera para arreglar la cocina y otros detalles que le hacen falta para ser utilizado. Doa Marta es socia de la Empresa de Crdito Comunal Canalete, una de las 100 organizaciones socias de EDESA en Costa Rica. Este ser su tercer prstamo y con l espera continuar creciendo a nivel personal y econmico adems de participar activamente en la organizacin de crdito en su comunidad.
texts.en:
Marta Eugenia L. L. is a 43 year old woman who lives with her husband and five children in the community of Canalete, which is located in Upala, Alajuela Province. This place is located in a semi-mountainous area where the main business activities mostly revolve around livestock breeding and agriculture. In this community there are great opportunities to develop and establish micro-enterprises, particularly in the agriculture and retail sectors.

Several years ago Doa Marta decided to start her own business, so she bought a cottage next to her house and rents it out to students and tourists in the area. This provides her with a source of income that will allow her to move her children forward. However, due to the lack of maintenance, the cottage is in very bad condition. It needs to be repaired so that it can be rented out and continue generating income. For this reason, Marta needs a loan of 617,000 CRC to buy windows, doors, and wood to repair the kitchen and fix other details that are lacking so that the cottage can be used.

Doa Marta is a member of the Canalete Communal Credit Enterprise, one of 100 member organizations that make up EDESA in Costa Rica. This will be her third loan and she hopes to continue growing on a personal and financial level. She is also an active participant in her local credit organization.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase windows, doors, and wood to repair her rental cottage

loan.name: Mara Auxiliadora Group

texts.es: Este comite se forma por iniciativa de las integrantes del comite que se enteraron del Programa de Comite de Mujeres y decidieron trabajar para ayudar a sus maridos a sacar adelante a sus familia de la mejor manera. Todas la seoras de este comit son de familias humildes, muy trabajadoras y tienen el deseo de que sus hijos terminen sus estudios terciario para tener una vida mejor. Una de las integrantes integrantes es la seora Nelida quien se dedica a la venta de huevos y gallinas, ella nos comenta que esta actividad requiere de mucha atencin, por que las aves son muy delicados en cuanto al cuidado. La ganancia mayor ella obtiene de la venta de huevos, y tambien obtiene ingresos cuando vende las gallinas en descartes. Ella vende los huevos a varios negocios de la zona, y estos constantemente solicitan su producto en gran cantidad. Actualmente necesita alimentos especiales para sus gallinas, y solicita el credito para la compra de balanceados.
texts.en:
This committee was formed as a result of the initiative of its members upon learning about the Committee of Women Entrepreneurs Program. They made the decision to work so that they could help their spouses move their families forward in the best way possible. All of the women in this committee come from modest families. They are hard workers who want to see their children complete a higher education so that they can have a better life.

One of the members is Sra. Nelida who sells eggs and chickens. She says this business requires a great amount of attention because the birds are very delicate in terms of their care. Her greatest source of revenue is the sale of eggs, but she also earns income when she sells hens that she no longer needs.

Nelida sells the eggs to different businesses in the area. Her customers constantly request her product in large quantities. She is requesting a loan because she currently needs to buy specialized feed for her hens.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase poultry feed

loan.name: Reyna De Los ngeles

texts.es:
La seora Reyna de los ngeles R. F., vive en el reparto Juan Ramn Padilla, es casada, de 37 aos cuyo esposo labora como chofer, siendo la fuente de ingreso de la economa del hogar, son una familia de 5 hijos los cuales estudian la primaria y a secundaria.
Ellos son una familia muy humilde que dentro de sus planes a futuro estn las remodelaciones de su hogar, la seora se dedica a la venta de frijoles y es por esta razn que solicitan un prstamo para la compra de granos bsicos y abarrotera para aumentar el inventario y elevar los volmenes de ventas, y que a futuro mejoren poco a poco la economa de esta humilde familia.
texts.en:
Mrs Reyna de los ngeles R. F. lives in the Juan Ramon Padilla division, is married and 37 years old. Her husband works as a driver, which is the source of income for their family. They are a family with 5 children who study in elementary and high school. They are a very humble family. Part of their plans for the future include remodeling their home. Reyna sells beans, and it is for this reason that she is requesting a loan for the purchase of basic grains and groceries to increase her inventory and volume of sales, and so that in the future she can improve her humble family's economic state bit by bit.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: the purchase of basic grains and groceries

loan.name: Los Emprendedores Group

texts.en:
Los Emprendedores is a communal bank formed by fourteen socios (borrowers) who reside in La Florida district. These individuals are primarily dedicated to their individual occupation: a seamstress, a baker, an artist (wood pieces), and a salesperson (sells CDs, socks and underwear).
Fabiola is the delegate of this group. In the photo she is found in the back row, second from the right, and is wearing a purple jacket. She bakes pastries, alfajores (a traditional Arabic confection) and various cookies and sells them in a stand that she has created in front of her house. She also distributes wholesale for other business to sell within the neighborhood. Fabiola learned how to make pastries from her father who was a bread-maker and pastry chef.
With this loan, Fabiola intends to purchase the principle ingredients needed to produce these goodies. Her dream is to one day open a pastry shop in a grand location and afterwards add to it a shop that will sell these ingredients for other to make them too.
Febiola lives with her husband and 7-year-old daughter. She enjoys participating in the weekly bank meetings along with the other socias (borrowers) and the loan officer. She credits Fondo Esperanzas weekly bank meetings with enabling her to socialize with other entrepreneurs and learn from their experiences too.
La Florida is a community located to the southeast of Santiago (the capital of Chile). The community itself is quite diverse, representing all sectors of socioeconomic levels. This area has an active commercial life which is manifested in the existence of several new shopping centers. In recent years, this sector has experienced explosive growth.

loan.use: To buy more ingredients need to produce her pastries

loan.name: Patricia Elizableth

texts.es:
Patricia de 28 aos, vive en el suburbio de Guayaquil, ella vende productos Yambal (empresa que ofrece a mujeres emprendedoras comenzar con sus ventas independientes), aunque esta divorciada ella sigue trabajando para su hijo de 2 aos.
Realiza su trabajo sola para poder mantener a su hijo, trabaja desde muy temprano ofreciendo los productos a sus vecinos y amigos, vende perfumes desde $ 20.00 hasta $ 75.00 c/u. una de las preocupaciones que tiene es dejar solo a su hijo con su mama, mientras que sale a trabajar.
Con el prstamo quiere comprar productos Yambal como perfumes, cremas, desodorantes. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y darle una buena a su hijo.
texts.en:
Patricia is 28 years old and lives in Suburbio de Guayaquil. She sells products manufactured by Yambal (a company that offers women entrepreneurs the opportunity to start their own independent sales businesses). She is divorced and continues to work to support her two year old son.

Since she works alone in order to provide for her child, Patricia begins very early offering her products to neighbors and friends. She sells perfumes ranging from $20.00 to $75.00 per unit. One of her worries is leaving her son alone with her mother while she is away working.

This loan will be used to buy Yambal products such as perfumes, crmes, and deodorants. In the future, Patricia wants to finish the construction of her house and provide good things for her son.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase perfumes, crmes, and deodorants

loan.name: Jesus Cristobal

texts.es:
Jess de 46 aos, es mecnico y vive en Primavera de Duran (zona periurbana, con una ecologa en disolucin a las afuera de Guayaquil), tiene tres hijos y su esposa es profesora de una escuela.
Para poder mantener a su familia y por la falta de oportunidades el tuvo que trabajar desde joven como mecnico, con esfuerzo a podido construir su casa y mantener a su familia, ahora tambin esta trabajando como conserje en sus ratos libes para tener mas ingresos.
Para construir mejor su casa el quiere comprar con el prstamo cemento y arena. En el futuro el quiere aumentar su casa con un segundo piso y as darle una mejor vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Jess is 46 years old and works as a mechanic. He lives in Primavera de Duran (a periurban area outside of Guayaquil that has a deteriorating ecosystem). Jess has three children and his wife works as a schoolteacher.

Due to the lack of opportunities he faced as a young man, he had to work as a mechanic in order to support his family. With effort he was able to build a house and provide what his family needed. Now he also works as a janitor in his spare time to earn additional income.

To build the best home he can, Jess wants to buy cement and sand. In the future, he wants to expand his house by adding a second floor and hopes to provide a better life for his children.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase cement & sand for building his house

loan.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
El seor Julio Cesar C. V., tiene la edad de 38 aos vive en el Barrio de la Borgoa es casado, y con su mujer tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad que estudian el colegio y el mayor la universidad, ellos son agricultores tienen 12 aos y fue gracias al apoyo de su padre que le cedi un lote de terreno para que lo trabajara y comenzara a encaminar su vida y la de su familia.
Ahora l solicita un prstamo para la compra de insumos y fertilizantes que brinden un mejor mantenimiento a los cultivos de la pia, este capital le beneficiara a su economa familiar y personal para futuros proyectos que tengan en mente que favorezcan a su vida profesional, y/o familiar.
texts.en:
Mr Julio Cesar C. V., age 38, lives in the neighbourhood of la Borgona. He is married, and he and his wife have three grown children who study in high school- the oldest is in university. They have been farmers for 12 years, thanks to the help of his father who gave him a plot of land so that he could work and start his life and that of his family. He is now requesting a loan for the purchase of inputs and fertilizers which will provide a better maintenance to his pineapple crops. This capital will benefit his family's finances and his personal finances for future projects which he has in mind for his professional and/or family life.

Translated from Spanish by Christine Cooper, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: the purchase of inputs and fertilizer

loan.name: Yessenia Carolina

texts.es:
La seora Yessenia Carolina B. H. tiene la corta de edad de 22 aos vive en el Reparto Rigoberto Lopez Prez, es casada y su joven esposo es vendedor de frutas y verdura brindando un ingreso fijo a la economa de la familia. Ellos tienen una nia de 7 aos, que le dificulta el dejarla sola en la casa para ir a vender por tal razn es el papa quien realiza esta labor.
Pero esperan mejorar su economa y contratar el apoyo de una domestica que le apoye a vigilar la casa y velar por su hija, esto se lograra gracias a la mejora continua de la economa del hogar y para esto solicitan un prstamo para la compra de mayor inventario de abarrotes que aumenten el volumen de ventas y a largo plazo permitan llevar a cabo los planes de la familia.
texts.en:
Yessenia Carolina B. H. is 22 years old. This young woman lives in Reparto Rigoberto Lopez Prez. She is married, and her young husband is a fruit and vegetable seller, bringing in a stable income to support the family. They have a daughter who is seven years old, which makes it difficult to leave her alone in the house to go out and sell, and for this reason it is the father who does this work. But they hope to improve their economic situation and hire a domestic worker to help them watch the house and watch over their daughter. They will achieve this thanks to the continual improvement of their home's economic situation, and for this they are requesting a loan to buy a larger inventory of groceries that will increase their sales volume and will in the long term permit them to carry out their plans for the family.

Translated from Spanish by Danielle Maxson, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Increase inventory of groceries to permit increased sales

loan.name: Angela Del Pilar

texts.es: ngela Del Pilar tiene 32 aos de edad, hace ms de 4 aos que tiene este negocio que es la venta de mercadera en general. Ya que sus inicios se dan desde hace mucho tiempo, pues poco a poco es que ha ido mejorando su negocio. Por lo que sus clientes siempre estn solicitando diferentes productos como pantalones, camisas, faldas trajes y vestidos, ella con mucho esfuerzo y como toda madre luchadora ha demostrado que puede mejorar sus condiciones. Por lo que sus 3 hijos son su mayor felicidad y siempre est buscando la amera de proporcinales lo necesario. el financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima.
texts.en:
ngela Del Pilar is 32 years old. For more than four years, she has been in the business of selling general merchandise. Since the beginning she has gradually been able to improve her business. ngela tries very hard to satisfy her customers since they are always requesting different products such as trousers, shirts, skirts, suits, and dresses. Like any determined mother, she has demonstrated that she is able to improve her conditions. Her three children are her greatest joy, so she is always looking to provide them with what they need.

This loan will be used to buy merchandise.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Operating capital to acquire more merchandise

loan.name: Exito En Vista Hermosa Group

texts.es: GRUPO SOLIDARIO XITO EN VISTA HERMOSA LA SEORA FIDELINA A. D. FORMA PARTE DEL GRUPO SOLIDARIO , SIENDO ELLA LA PRESIDENTA DE ELLAS. SU NEGOCIO ES UNA TORTILLERIA LA CUAL DECEA QUE CREZCA A CADA DIA. ESTA AL LADO DE SUS HIJOS QUIEN LA APOYAN CON SUS SUEOS QUE DECEA REALIZAR. TAMBIEN SU COMPAERA EUFEMIA S. TIENE GRANDES SUEOS EN SU VIDA, VENDIENDO ORO BRASILEO, UN POCO DE CALZADO ROPA VARIADA EN MUCHOS LUGARES CON SUS CONOCIDAS. DOA ELULALIA NO SE CANSA DE NEGOCIAR Y TIENE MUCHO TIEMPO VENDIENDO EN DIFERENTES LUGARES, VENDIENDO ROPA DE TELA, FALDAS, BLUSAS, VESTIDOS Y MAS. LAS TRES TIENEN SUEOS MUY HERMOSOS PERO EL CAPITAL NO LES ALCANZA Y NO DEJARAN DE LUCHAR PARA ALCANZAR SUS METAS EN LA VIDA.
texts.en:
XITO EN VISTA HERMOSA Solidarity Group

Sra. Fidelina A. D. is part of this solidarity group and also serves as the President. She manages a tortilla shop that continues to grow each day. Her children are by her side and support her in the dreams that she wants to fulfill.

Another member of the group is Eufemia S., who has great dreams in life. She sells Brazilian gold, shoes, and various types of clothing to her acquaintances in different places.

Doa Eulalia is not tired of her business. She spends most of her time selling in different places. She offers clothing made of fabric such as skirts, blouses, dresses, and other items.

These three ladies have very beautiful dreams, but they lack sufficient capital. They will not give up fighting in order to achieve their goals in life.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Operating capital to buy more clothing

loan.name: Ramona Castilla

texts.es:
Ramona Castilla L. C. tiene 46 aos. Vive soltera en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 8 nios de 4 a 20 anos.
Ramona es una socia de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Ramona se dedica a la agricultura, tiene un pequeo terreno con maz y arroz. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao 2 cosechas al ano con maz y arroz.
Solicita el prstamo para sembrar cacao que necesita semillas, abonos, y fertilizantes qumicos con la esperanza de trabajar mas y sacar mas dinero. Su sueo es que sus hijos terminan sus estudios y que sean bien preparados para la vida. La preocupacin de sobrevivir se le enfrenta.
En su tiempo libre se encarga de sus muchachos.
texts.en:
Ramona Castilla L. C. is 46 years old and single. She lives in the Chillanes Canton in the Bolvar province. She has eight children from 4 to 20 years old. Ramona is a member of the El Placer (The Delight) Communal Bank. It is located three hours from Chillanes. There are 19 members in all, and most of them grow corn and cacao. This is their first loan from the Cooperativa San Jos. Ramona devotes herself to farming. She has a small piece of land with corn and rice. She makes her purchases and her sales in Mata de Cacoa. There are two harvests a year with corn and rice. She is requesting a loan to plant cacao, and she needs seeds and natural and chemical fertilizers. She hopes to work more and make more money. Her dream is that her children finish their education and that they are well prepared for life. The worry that she faces is survival. In her free time she takes care of her children.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Plant cacao

loan.name: Amada Petita

texts.es:
Amada Petita S. V. tiene 51 aos. Vive en unin libre en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 6 nios, 3 estan casados y los otros tres tienen 16, 18, y 19 anos.
Amada es una socia de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Amada se dedica a caseros domesticos, a criar pollos y al cultivo de maz. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao.
Solicita el prstamo para aumentar el negocio de pollos y para comprar las semillas y abonos para sus cultivos de maz. Su sueo es seguir adelante y ayudar a los hijos a estudiar (2 estan en la universidad).
En el poco tiempo libre que tiene, cuida a sus pollos, cocina en la casa, y a veces sale a fiestas.
texts.en:
Amada Petita is 51 years old. She is in a common-law marriage and lives in the Chillanes district in the Bolivar province. She has 6 children. Three of them are married and the others are 16, 18 and 19 years old. Amada is a partner of El Placer rural loan group which is located three hours away from Chillanes. There are 19 partners total, most of them grow corn and cacao. This is their first loan with San Jose Co-op. Amada takes care of her house and housework, raises chickens and grows corn. She buys and sells her produce in Mata de Cacao. She requests the loan to increase her chicken business and to purchase fertilizer and seeds to plant corn. Her dream is to move ahead and help her children, who are in school (two of them are in college). In the little free time that she has, she takes care of the chickens, cooks and sometimes goes to parties.

Translated from Spanish by Betyna Almeida-Covarrubias, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Increase the chicken business and purchase corn seeds

loan.name: Greyda Catalina

texts.es:
La seora Greyda Catalina R. A., tiene la edad de 30 aos vive en Santa Rosa, es casada y su esposo es mecnico y le apoya con sus ingresos a los gastos del hogar, ellos tienen 2 nios que estudian primaria y el pequeo preescolar, se dedican al comercio de venta de frutas y verduras, desde hace ya ms de 7 aos, y se inicio gracias al apoyo de su mam.
Los planes son el poseer su propio local en algn buen punto de venta y vender al por mayor, y por ese objetivo es que hoy en da solicitan un prstamo para la compra de materiales de construccin para llevar a cabo las edificaciones de su propio puesto de venta, tales como cemento, arena, y laminas de zinc, esta inversin les permitir aumentar sus ingresos y la posibilidad de incursionar en otras fuentes de ingreso para la mejora continua en la calidad de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
Greyda Catalina R. A. is 30 years old and lives in Santa Rosa. She is married, and her husband is a mechanic. With his income, he helps her cover the household expenses. They have two children who are in preschool and primary school. Greyda's work is selling fruits and vegetables. She has done this work for more than 7 years, and she started it thanks to support she received from her mother. Her plans are to have her own store in a good location and sell on a wholesale basis. Toward this aim, she is requesting a loan to buy construction materials to build the infrastructure for her own sales stall, such as cement, sand, and metal roofing sheets. This investment will allow her to increase her income and gain opportunities for other sources of income, so she can keep improving her family's quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Building her own store to sell fruits and vegetables

loan.name: Maria Elisa

texts.es:
Maria Elisa C. M. tiene 46 aos. Vive en unin libre en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 1 nia de 24 anos y una nieta de 4 anos.
Maria es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Maria es ama de casa y ayuda a su esposo en el campo. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao. Solicita el prstamo para cultivar maz con la compra de semillas y abonos para plantificar las cosechas y hacerlo bien. Su sueo es dejar algo a su hija para una casita. Regularmente tiene un gripe y este presenta en obstculo en su trabajo y en su vida.
Le gusta estudiar la biblia.
texts.en:
Maria Elisa C. M. is 46 years old. She lives with her common-law husband in the canton of Chillanes, in Bolvar province. She has a 24-year-old daughter and a granddaughter who is 4 years old. Maria is a member of the rural solidarity group El Placer, which is located three hours from Chillanes. The group has a total of 19 members, most of whom are involved in growing corn and cacao [cocoa]. This is their first loan through the San Jos Cooperative. Maria is a homemaker and helps her husband in the fields. She carries out her purchases and sales in Mata de Cacao. She is requesting the loan to plant corn; she will buy seeds and fertilizer to plant a successful crop. Her dream is to leave something to her daughter so she can have a little house. She regularly gets the flu, and this presents a barrier to her in her work and in her life. She enjoys studying the Bible.

Translated from Spanish by Patricia Linderman, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Buying seeds and fertilizer to plant corn

loan.name: Roberto Jose

texts.es: El seor Roberto Jose R. G., tienen la edad de 29 aos vive en el Barrio de Santa Rosa, es casado y su esposa labora como docente, aportando al gasto del hogar, ellos tienen un hijo de 8 aos el cual actualmente estudia la primaria, dentro de sus mayores necesidades esta la mejora de su vivienda. Ellos son vendedores de frutas y verduras en el Mercado Roberto Huembs, y la crisis que atraviesa el pas no le ha permitido invertir en el negocio o llevar a cabo planes de remodelacin de la infraestructura del hogar es por esta razn que solicita un prstamo para la compra de cemento, hierro, bloque, en si materiales de construccin que lleven a cabo estos planes de cambio en las condiciones de su vida cotidiana.
texts.en:
Mr. Roberto Jose R. G. is 29 years old and lives in the Santa Rosa neighborhood. He is married and his wife works as a teacher in order to contribute toward the household expenses. They have an eight year old son who attends elementary school. Improving their home is among their greatest needs. They sell fruits and vegetables in the Roberto Huembs market, but the crisis facing the country has prevented them from investing into the business or from upgrading their home. It is for this reason that they are requesting this loan. They will use the money to buy cement, iron bars, cinder blocks, and building materials so that they can improve their living conditions.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo R., Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Building materials

loan.name: Susy Eva

texts.es:
Susy de 23 aos, Suburbio de Guayaquil(zona urbana, la mayora de habitantes son comerciantes informales), ella vende productos qumicos, como shampoo, desinfectante, etc.
Empez con los productos qumicos hace aos atrs, por el consejo de uno de sus amigos el cual le enseo a preparar productos qumicos desde ese tiempo a continuado con el negocio de qumicos que los dos haban empezado, trabaja desde las 08h00am hasta las 16h00pm todos los das. Ella hace shampoo, desinfectante, aromatizante, y los llena en envases plsticos.
Ella quiere comprar con el prstamo mas qumicos para hacer sus productos, en el futuro quiere tener su propia distribuidora de qumicos y terminar de construir su casa
texts.en:
Susy is 23 years old and lives in Suburbio de Guayaquil (an urban area where most of the residents are informal merchants). She sells household chemical products such as shampoos, disinfectants, and other items.

She started her business several years ago after one of her friends taught her how to prepare the products. Since then she has continued the chemical business that the two of them started. Susy works from 8am to 4pm every day. She makes shampoos, disinfectants, and air fresheners and packages them in plastic containers.

Susy wants to use her loan to buy more chemicals for making her products. In the future, she wants to have her own distribution center and finish the construction of her house.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase household chemicals

loan.name: Tanya Mariela

texts.es:
Tanya Mariela P. S. tiene 19 aos. Es soltera y vive con sus padres en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar.
Tanya es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Tanya se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo de maz y arroz. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao 2 veces al ano para el maz y 4 veces al ano para arroz.
Solicita el prstamo para sembrar maz, comprar abonos y semillas para el mejoramiento de los cultivos. Su sueo es ser profesional, tener una familia y una casa, y ayudar a sus padres. Se le enfrentan las enfermedades en los cultivos.
Le gusta jugar indor futbol y basketball.
texts.en:
Tanya Mariela P. S. is 19 years old. She is single and lives with her parents in the canton of Chillanes and province of Bolvar. Tanya is a member of the rural, communal bank El Placer (The Pleasure), which is located three hours from Chillanes. In total, the bank has 19 members. Their main activity is the cultivation of corn and cocoa. This is the first loan they have requested from the Cooperativa San Jos. Tanya works in agriculture and cultivates corn and rice. She does her buying and selling in Mata de Cacao, twice a year for corn and four times a year for rice. She requests this loan to sow corn and to purchase fertilizer and seeds so that her crops thrive. Her dream is to be professional, have a family and a house, and help her parents. She has to battle diseases in her crops. She likes to play indoor soccer and basketball.

Translated from Spanish by Jeff Schell, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: cultivation of corn

loan.name: Luis Olimpo

texts.es:
Luis Olimpo F. V. tiene 36 aos. Vive en unin libre en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 5 nios de 14, 9, 8, 5, y 2 anos.
Luis es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Luis se dedica a la agricultura y tiene cultivos de maracuy y cacao. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Matilde cada fin de semana.
Solicita el prstamo para invertir y dar mantenimiento a los cultivos de cacao y mejor su econmica personal. Su sueo es poder darles una buena educacin a todos sus hijos.
Le gusta practicar la lectura y jugar indor futbol.
texts.en:
Luis Olimpo F. V. is 36 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage in the canton of Chillanes and the province of Bolvar. He has five children aged 14, 9, 8, 5, and 2. Luis is a member of the rural, communal bank El Placer (The Pleasure), which is located three hours from Chillanes. In total, the bank has 19 members. Their main activity is the cultivation of corn and cocoa. This is the first loan they have requested from the Cooperativa San Jos. Luis works in agriculture and cultivates passion fruit and cocoa. He does his buying and selling every weekend in Matilde. He requests this loan to maintain his plantings of cocoa and improve his financial position. His dream is to give a good education to all his children. He likes to read and play indoor soccer.

Translated from Spanish by Jeff Schell, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: maintain his plantings of cocoa

loan.name: Judith Erlinda

texts.es:
Judith Erlinda L. tiene 49 aos, su familia la conforman su cnyuge y sus 3 hijos de 20 a 26 aos de edad y vive en el barrio 7 de Abril de la ciudad de Barranquilla; desde all se dedica a la comercializacin de varios productos alimenticios y no alimenticios como suero, queso, abarcas, mochilas, suter y ropa interior. Ella proveniente de San Jacinto en el departamento de Bolvar, desde sus 24 aos se vino a Barranquilla y como si quisiera trasladar a esta ciudad su historia, se trajo en su mente y en su corazn un poco de su pueblo natal y por eso inici su negocio vendiendo los productos autctonos de su pueblo: productos no alimenticios bolsos, abarcas y mochilas y alimenticios suero y queso. Hoy despus de tanto tiempo recuerda el momento en que lleg de su pueblo buscando nuevos horizontes por eso empez a trabajar en la panadera de su to, pero al casarse se dedic completamente a su hogar, pero con su capacidad emprendedora logra desarrollar sus potencialidades mediante su negocio, hasta lo que hoy es y lo que ella proyecta que en un futuros sea.
Este es el primer crdito que solicita a la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, con el planea continuar conectada a su ciudad de origen San Jacinto, lugar desde donde comprar bolsos y mochilas que tiene encargados por los clientes en Barranquilla y llevar a este mismo pueblo ropa para damas, caballeros y nios.
Su meta es acceder a varios crditos de la Fundacin que le faciliten aumentar sus inventarios para apoyar mucho ms los gastos del hogar, as mismo generar mayores utilidades que le permitan ayudar a que su hija termine la universidad y que su hijo que ya tiene familia construya su hogar de manera independiente.
texts.en:
Judith Erlinda L. is 49 years old. Her family consists of her husband and three children who are between the ages of 20 and 26. She lives in the April 7th neighborhood in the city of Barranquilla. Judith sells various types of food and merchandise such as whey, cheese, sandals, backpacks, sweaters, and undergarments. She is from San Jacinto in the Department of Bolvar, but when she was 24, she moved to Barranquilla because of the citys history. Thoughts of her hometown remained in her mind and her heart, so she began selling products made by its people such as non-food bags, sandals, backpacks, and foods such as cheese and whey. Even though it has been a long time since she first moved to Barranquilla, Judith still remembers the moment when she arrived in search of new horizons. She began working at uncles bakery. After getting married, she became a full-time homemaker but her enterprising spirit pushed her to develop her potential by starting a business. At the moment, Judith intends to keep her business running into the future.

This is the first loan she has requested from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo. Judith plans to remain connected with her birth city of San Jacinto by purchasing bags and backpacks that are manufactured there and bringing them to her customers in Barranquilla. In addition she will bring back with her clothing for women, men, and children.

Her goal is to obtain several loans from Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo to increase her inventory, which will be a great help in paying the household expenses. At the same time, she will be able to generate more income that will allow her daughter to finish university and enable her son to build a home so that his family can live independently.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase bags, backpacks, and clothing

loan.name: Julieth Cecilia

texts.es:
Julieth Cecilia L. es una joven mujer que tiene 27 aos y vive en el barrio 7 de Abril de Barranquilla, donde realiza apoyada por su madre una serie de actividades que le producen dinero como son la confeccin de uniformes, venta de carnes fras como salchichas y tambin comercializa mercancas entre sabanas, ropa, calzado, cosmtico estos ltimos a crdito, mientras trabaja como empleada ejerciendo la actividad tcnica que aprendi en la universidad.
Vive con su cnyuge y su nico hijo de 5 aos a quien desea ensearle los valores con los que sus padres la educaron: la estabilidad familiar, el amor al trabajo y la responsabilidad, con la que parametriza su vida; se inici trabajando desde muy joven y estudi a su vez tcnica en sistemas de informacin; y fue precisamente desde la universidad donde inici su negocio comercializando productos, como sabanas, toallas, accesorios femeninos entre sus compaeros de estudio y con la ayuda de su madre; Al terminar sus estudios empez a trabajar en una empresa privada donde encuentr oportunidades de aumentar su clientela de mercanca y simultneamente se inici en la confeccin de uniformes, realizando negociaciones que le permiten adicionar un nuevo ingreso, porque aunque no es ella la que realiza las operaciones de la confeccin, en la actualidad gestiona contratos con organizaciones educativas y le paga la mano de obra a una seora que trabaja en la mquina de Julieth en su casa con la supervisin de su madre.
Este es su tercer crdito con la Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, organizacin que la ha apoyado en el desarrollo de su creatividad emprendedora, porque teniendo esos recursos de crdito siempre est pensando en oportunidades de negocios para invertirle un capital que aumente sus ingresos, otro de los aspectos que ha mejorado es que con sus ingresos, procedentes del negocio, ha podido pagar los estudios de su hijo en un colegio bilinge y adems ha comprado de contado a un mejor precio, para vender estas mercancias a un precio competitivo.
Como negociante aun se encuentra perfeccionando sus posibilidades, mientras tambin trabaja como empleada desde que salio de la universidad y todo esto para ofrecerle un futuro mejor a su familia. En la actualidad est solicitando un credikiva que lo invertir en la compra de telas con las que responder a contratos con un colegio y mercancas varias como ropa, toallas, accesorios y calzados.
texts.en:
Julieth Cecilia L. is a young woman who is 27 years of age and lives in the April 7th neighborhood of Barranquilla. She and her mother engage in a series of income-generating activities such as making uniforms, selling fried meats such as salchichas (sausages), and selling merchandise on credit such as bed linens, clothing, shoes, and the latest cosmetics. Julieth also works as an employee at a job where she exercises the technical skills she learned while attending university.

She lives with her husband and five year old son. Julieth wants to teach her child the values that defined her life and were instilled in her by her parents such as family stability, love of work, and responsibility. She began working at a young age while studying for her technical degree in information systems. It was while she was at university that she began her business selling products such as bed linens, towels, and womens accessories to her classmates with the help of her mother. Upon finishing her degree, she began working at a private company where she found opportunities to increase her customer base for selling merchandise. At the same time, she became involved in producing uniforms. Since she was not directly responsible for the sewing, Julieth began initiating negotiations to create new sources of income and now has contracts with educational organizations. A woman uses the machine in Julieths home to do all the sewing under the supervision of her mother.

This is her third loan with Fundacin Mario Santo Domingo, an organization that has supported the development of her entrepreneurial creativity. These available credit resources have provided her with opportunities to invest in her businesses and have the capital to increase her earnings. Another aspect that has improved is her income since she can pay for her sons studies at a bilingual school. In addition, she is able to make business purchases in cash so that she can get a better price, which makes her more competitive when selling her products.

As a businesswoman, she is still refining her abilities while working at the job she obtained upon finishing university. She does all this so that she can provide a better future for her family. At the moment, Julieth is requesting a Kiva loan to invest in the purchase of fabrics so that she can fulfill her school contracts. She will also buy different types of merchandise such as clothing, towels, accessories, and shoes.

Translated from Spanish by Ronan Reodica, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Purchase fabrics for her sewing business & merchandise to sell through her retail business

loan.name: Felix Angel

texts.es:
Felix Angel A. G. tiene 34 aos. Vive en unin libre en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 2 nios de 10 y 9 anos.
Felix es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Felix se dedica a la agricultura, al cultivo de maz, arroz, y cacao. Realiza sus compras de productos en Mata de Cacao cada 2 meses y se realiza la venta de sus productos en Matilde.
El prstamo ser invertido en la siembra de maz y para la compra de abonos para mejorar la ida en el econmico. Su sueo es tener buena vivencia y dar una buena educacin a sus hijos.
Le gusta jugar indor futbol, boly, y salir de paseo.
texts.en:
Felix Angel A. G. is 34 years old. He lives in a common law relationship in the canton of Chillanes in Bolvar Province. He has two children, ages 10 and 9.

Felix is a member of the El Placer (The Pleasure) rural communal bank, which is located three hours from Chillanes. There are 19 members in all, with the majority engaged in raising corn and cacao. This is the first loan that they have taken out with the Cooperativa San Jos.

Felix works as a farmer raising corn, rice and cacao. He purchases supplies in Mata de Cacao every two months and sells his products in Matilde. The loan will be invested in seed corn and in the purchase of fertilizer in order to improve his standard of living. His dream is to have a good livelihood and to give a good education to his children. He likes playing indoor soccer, bowling, and going for walks.

Translated from Spanish by Richard Brown, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: To purchase seed corn and fertilizer

loan.name: Dina Magdalena

texts.es: Dina tiene 20 aos de edad, reside en el municipio de Jucuapa, departamento de Usulutan, es casada y vive con el esposo y su pequeo hijo de 8 meses de edad, ella tiene una tienda de venta de productos de primera necesidad. El negocio lo inicio hace 5 aos con venta de productos lcteos y actualmente tiene una variedad de productos que ofrece a los clientes, el negocio esta ubicado en la casa de habitacin y lo atiende de 6:00 am- 8:00pm, es una persona emprendedora y con experiencia en el negocio, actualmente solicita un prstamo para compra de productos como son: queso, crema y cuajada, esto ayudara a incrementar los productos para ofrecer a los clientes y mejorar las ventas. Los sueos son manejar un negocio fuerte, atraer clientes, ser una buena empresaria que le permita mejorar las condiciones de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
Dina is 20 years old and lives in the town of Jucuapa, within the Usulutan department. She is married and lives with her husband and eight month old son. She has a store where she sells basic need products. She started the business by selling milk products five years ago. Now she has a variety of products to offer her customers. The business is located within her home and she works from 6:00AM to 8:00PM. She is a very enterprising woman with lots of experience. She is asking for this loan so that she can buy products such as cheese, cream, and milk curd. This will help her increase her inventory so that she can have more to offer her customers and also increase her sales. She dreams of being able to manage a strong business, attract customers, and be a good entrepreneur in order to improve her family's life.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Inventory

loan.name: Jenny Fernanda

texts.es:
Jenny Fernanda V. B. tiene 29 aos. Vive soltera en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar. Tiene 7 hijos de 14-4 anos.
Jenny es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Jenny se dedica a la casa, cuidando a los animales y los pollos. Las personas vienen a su casa para comprar. Solicita el prstamo para criar cerdos, pollos, y alimentos para animales. Su sueo poner una tienda en la casa y darles estudios a sus hijos.
Le gusta conversar con su vecina en su tiempo libre.
texts.en:
Jenny Fernanda V. B. is 29 years old and lives in the Chillanes hamlet, within the Bolvar province. She is a single mother with seven children, ranging in ages from 4 to 14. Jenny is an associate of " La Ventanilla Rural El Placer" (The Pleasure Rural Window), located three hours from Chillanes. There are a total of 19 members, most of whom raise corn and cacao. This will be the first loan that they request through the San Jos cooperative. Jenny raises animals and chickens and people visit her home to buy them. She is asking for this loan so that she can raise hogs, chickens, and buy animal feed. She wants to eventually open a store within her home and be able to give her children a good education. She enjoys talking to her neighbor in her spare time.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Hogs, chickens, and feed

loan.name: Carlos Hipolito

texts.es:
Carlos Hipolito M. C. tiene 52 aos. Vive soltero en el cantn de Chillanes en la provincia de Bolvar.
Carlos es un socio de la ventanilla rural El Placer, que est ubicada a tres horas de Chillanes. Son 19 socios en total, que en la mayoridad se dedican al cultivo de maz y cacao. Esto es el primer prstamo que ellos sacan con la Cooperativa San Jos.
Carlos se dedica a la agricultura y a la cultivo de cacao, maz y arroz. Realiza sus compras y ventas en Mata de Cacao, Matilde, y Bucay cada 4 o 5 das.
Solicita el prstamo para la maz, las semillas, y los fertilizantes para mejorar su situacin econmico. Su sueo es vivir un poco mejor y tener una profesin abogado. A veces el tiempo, las plagas, y las enfermedades afectan a su agricultura.
Es fantico de lectura, las polticas y la biblia.
texts.en:
Carlos Hipolito M. C. is 52 years old and lives in the Chillanes hamlet, within the Bolvar province. He is an associate of " La Ventanilla Rural El Placer" (The Pleasure Rural Window), located three hours from Chillanes. There are a total of 19 members, most of whom raise corn and cacao. This will be the first loan that they request through the San Jos cooperative. Carlos is a farmer who raises cacao, corn, and rice. He buys and sells his products every four or five days in Mata de Cacao, Matilde, and Bucay. He is asking for this loan so that she can buy seeds and fertilizer so that he can improve his economic situation. He wants to better his life and become an attorney. At times the weather, blights, and diseases affect his crops. He loves to read and enjoys politics and the bible.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Seed and fertilizer

loan.name: Ana Deysi

texts.es: Ana tiene 46 aos de edad reside en el municipio de Chinameca, departamento de San Miguel, es casada, vive con el esposo y dos hijos de las edades de 17 y 19 aos , ella se dedica a la venta de tortilla de maz. El negocio lo inicio hace 6 aos, ella comienza a elaborar las tortillas de 10:00 am- 3:00pm, dicho negocio est ubicado en la casa de habitacin. Ella necesita invertir en compra de maz, lea, cal, que son productos necesarios para elaborar las tortillas, por cual est solicitando el prstamo que le ayudara para seguir con el negocio y as solventar las necesidades bsicas de la familia. Los sueos de Ana mantener el negocio, continuar con su espritu empresarial para mejorar las condiciones de vida de la familia
texts.en:
Ana is 46 years old and lives in the town of Chinameca, within the San Miguel department. She is married and lives with her husband. Her business is the sale of corn tortillas. She started her business six years ago and works out of her home, making tortillas from 10:00 AM to 3:00 PM. She needs to buy dried corn, firewood, and salt, which she needs to make tortillas. She is asking for this loan in order to continue the business and be able to provide for her familys basic needs. Ana wants to maintain her business and continue with her entrepreneurial spirit in order to improve her familys quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by Hugo Reyes, Kiva Volunteer

loan.use: Ingredients
